Name: Smithy
About the game: Smithy is an underground rodent that happens to be an excellent weapons smith. - Blast your way through procedural generated caverns using unique weapons. - Face new and interesting enemies as you burrow your way deeper. - Find hidden treasures to purchase new weapons and upgrades. - Destroy everything standing in your way! * To change controls or resolution, hold Shift when launching the game.
